thread.title: Hippo savagely beaten to death in zoo with metal bars and rocks by gangsters
thread.title_full: Hippo savagely beaten to death in zoo with metal bars and rocks by gangsters

title: Hippo savagely beaten to death in zoo with metal bars and rocks by gangsters
text:
El Salvador's Culture Ministry SAVAGE: El Salvador is in mourning after the death of their beloved hippo 
Gustavito, 15, emerged from his pool with stab wounds and bruises all over his body after the sickening attack, El Salvador, Central America. 
The much-loved beast died from his injuries after wounds led to eating problems. 
Salvadorans mourned the tragic death by leaving flowers at the gate of the national zoo, which has been closed until further notice. 
El Salvador's Culture Ministry FATAL: Gustavito did not recover from his savage injuries “They kill us like flies, but this tops it all. They killed an animal that only entertains us” Martin Castillo 
Mourners in the murder capital said they were used to seeing people killed on the streets but this act of savagery had left them numb, comparing Gustavito's death to Harambe. 
It is unclear why the gang targeted the gentle giant. 
Street vendor Martin Castillo: "Here we're used to seeing the dead every day. GRAPHIC CONTENT: Worst cases of animal cruelty Monday, 28th November 2016 WARNING GRAPHIC CONTENT: As part of our new 'STOP THE CRUELTY' campaign we take a look at some of the most horrific cases animal cruelty. 1 / 29 PA Handout photo issued by the Orangutan Foundation of Aan, a critically-endangered orangutan who was blinded after being shot more than 100 times with an air rifle. Aan is to undergo an operation that could restore her sight. 
"They kill us like flies, but this tops it all. They killed an animal that only entertains us." 
Grandma Carmen Rogel was devastated to find the mammal had died. 
She said: "We're angry. We didn't know they had killed Gustavito and were surprised when we arrived and the gate was closed." 
Zoo director Vladan Henriquez confirmed Gustavito's injuries were discovered days after the attack because he did not leave his pool. 
Gustavito was born and raised in Guatemala, and brought to El Salvador 13 years ago. 
El Salvador is one of the most dangerous places in the world , where an average of 14 people are killed every day. A professional model with a sideline in hunting, guns and taxidermy. 1 / 11 Bikini and an assault rifle, making America great again I've never despised humanity more than I do now. RIP Gustavito. pic.twitter.com/NUNMnsHTAY — Kevin Tihista (@KevinTihista1) February 28, 2017 
Powerful drug gangs who run the country's streets have been blamed for the shocking murder rate. 
The brutal Mara Salvatrucha gang , has even issued a chilling warning that they are aiming to top the world's murder table. Related articles
